DOC.brief_summary: chronic PDE5-Inhibition improves endothelial function in diabetics
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Chronic PDE5-Inhibition on Endothelial Function in Diabetics
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation of endothelial function at baseline and after chronic administration of sildenafil in male subjects with diabetes
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetes males females, nitrate use, PDE5Inhibitors intolerance
